info.titleen: My puppy's got something wrong with his paw
info.titleko: 내 강아지 발(바닥)에 무슨 문제가 있나 봐요.
info.descko: 다리를 저는 강아지를 위해 동물병원에서 수의사에게 진찰를 받고있어요.
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Yes, my puppy's got something wrong with his paw.
sentense.en_: Yes, my puppy's got something wrong with his paw.
sentense.ko: 네, 내 강아지 발(바닥)에 무슨 문제가 있나 봐요.

sentense.en: The right, front one. He's been limping for two days.
sentense.en_: The right, front one. He's been limping for two days.
sentense.ko: 오른쪽 앞발이요. 이틀 동안이나 계속 다리를 절고 있어요.

sentense.en: I can see it hurts. He's licking it.
sentense.en_: I can see it hurts. He's licking it.
sentense.ko: 다친 거 같군요. 강아지가 핥고 있군요.

sentense.en: I thought maybe it would get better on its own, but it hasn't.
sentense.en_: I thought maybe it would get better on its own, but it hasn't.
sentense.ko: 저절로 나을 것으로 생각했어요. 그런데, 그렇지 않더군요.

sentense.en: Can you hold him while I take a look?
sentense.en_: Can you hold him while I take a look?

sentense.en: Yes, I think he's got a little piece of glass in his paw.
sentense.en_: Yes, I think he's got a little piece of glass in his paw.
sentense.ko: 예, 그 발바닥에 작은 유리 조각이 박힌 것으로 생각됩니다.

sentense.en: Let me get some instruments. I'll be right back
sentense.en_: Let me get some instruments. I'll be right back
